chapter.title: Customers' Feedback
chapter.para: Software companies live for and from their users. Software is developed for users to be used and companies want to get paid for it. To develop good software a good and vivid communication between users and developers is needed. To achieve this several channels are provided for different kind of information. These channels are described in the next sections.
